msg: use the -D mechanism to pass parameter instead of build.properties.tests

author: vmassol
msg: passed arguments using -D mechanism instead of using a build.properties.tests (it is a better mechanism and needed for GUMP) + added support for Tomcat 3.3

author: vmassol
msg: (forget the stupid thing I just committed !). Here is the correct thing: It seems that the latest Xalan 2 is less permissive and that all XSL parameters need to be defined before being used (so, added needed <xsl:param> defs)
